温馨提示：开始体验前，请先设置房间号和用户名。: Set the room ID and username before you try out the features.
字符类型，房间内须唯一: A string, which must be unique across the room
房间号为大于零整数: The room ID must be a positive integer.
房间号不能超过%s: The room ID must not exceed %s.
必填，字符类型，房间内须唯一: Required; a string that is unique across the room
内置美颜功能支持设置美颜、美白、红润效果级别。: Setting the strength of beauty, skin brightening, and rosy skin effects
美颜级别，取值范围0 - 9，0表示关闭，1 - 9值越大，效果越明显: Beauty strength. Value range: 0-9. 0 indicates that the filter is disabled. The larger the value, the more obvious the effect.
美白级别，取值范围0 - 9，0表示关闭，1 - 9值越大，效果越明显: Skin brightening strength. Value range: 0-9. 0 indicates that the filter is disabled. The larger the value, the more obvious the effect.
红润级别，取值范围0 - 9，0表示关闭，1 - 9值越大，效果越明显，该参数: Rosy skin strength. Value range: 0-9. 0 indicates that the filter is disabled. The larger the value, the more obvious the effect. This parameter is unavailable on Windows currently.
SDK 内部集成了两套风格不同的磨皮算法，一套我们取名叫“光滑”，适用于美女秀场:
The SDK has two built-in skin smoothing algorithms. One is "smooth", which features more obvious smoothing effect and is designed for showrooms.  
    The other is "natural", which retains more facial details and is more natural.
光滑 - 适合娱乐场景，效果比较明显: Smooth - more obvious skin smoothing effect; designed for showrooms
自然 - 更多地保留了面部细节，主观感受上会更加自然: Natural - more facial details retained and more natural
大小画面(双路编码), 可开启大小画面双路编码模式: Big and small images, i.e., dual-channel encoding
如果当前用户是房间中的主要角色（例如主播、老师、主持人等），并且使用 PC 或者: You can enable this mode if the current user is in the major role (such as anchor, teacher, or host) and uses a PC or Mac.
开启该模式后，当前用户会同时输出【高清】和【低清】两路视频流（但只有一路音频流）: In this mode, the user will output one channel of audio stream and two channels of video streams: an **HD stream** and a **smooth stream**.
对于开启该模式的当前用户，会占用更多的网络带宽，并且会更加消耗 CPU 计算资源: This mode consumes more bandwidth and CPU computing resources.
对于同一房间的远程观众而言：: For the audience in the room:
- 如果用户的下行网络很好，可以选择观看【高清】画面: - Select the **HD** stream to watch if the user’s downstream network conditions are good.
- 如果用户的下行网络较差，可以选择观看【低清】画面: - Select the **smooth** stream to watch if the user’s downstream network conditions are poor.
展示 SDK 的所有技术指标, 包括本地和远程的, 每2秒回调一次: Obtaining statistics on all technical metrics of the SDK, including local and remote ones, through callbacks every 2 seconds
TRTC 中两个不同音视频房间中的主播，可以通过“跨房连麦”功能拉通连麦通话功能: The cross-room co-anchoring feature allows two anchors from different rooms to co-anchor with each other without having to exit their own rooms.
例如：当房间“001”中的主播 A 通过 connectOtherRoom(): For example, after anchor A in room 001 uses connectOtherRoom() to successfully call anchor B in room 002, all users in room 001 will receive the onUserEnter(B) and onUserVideoAvailable(B,true) callbacks, and all users in room 002 will receive the onUserEnter(A) and onUserVideoAvailable(A,true) callbacks.
简言之，跨房连麦的本质，就是把两个不同房间中的主播相互分享，让每个房间里的观众都: In essence, a cross-room call is sharing the audio and video of two anchors in different rooms to each other so that the audiences in both rooms can see two anchors.
本示例用于演示混流编码与CDN旁路直播，详细功能说明请参阅腾讯云官网文档：: This example shows how to mixtranscode streams and relay live streams to CDNs. For details about the features, please refer to:
等应用场景中，常需要将 TRTC 房间里的多路音视频流混合成一路，您可以使用腾讯:
you may need to mix multiple audio and video streams in a TRTC room into one stream, which can be achieved using TRTC’s mixtranscoding MCU cluster. The MCU cluster 
      can mix multiple audio and video streams as needed and distribute the mixed stream to live streaming CDNs and the on-cloud recording system.
接口说明请参阅腾讯云官网API：: For details about the APIs, please see:
视频渲染支持自定义镜像效果、旋转角度和填充模式。: Setting the mirror mode, image rotation, and fill mode
设置远端图像的渲染参数：接口: API for setting rendering parameters for remote video:
设置本地图像（主流）的渲染参数：接口: API for setting rendering parameters for local video (primary stream):
仅适用于直播场景（TRTCAppSceneLIVE 和 TRTCAppScene: This feature works only in live streaming scenarios (TRTCAppSceneLIVE and TRTCAppSceneVoiceChatRoom),
在直播场景下，一个用户可能需要在“观众”和“主播”之间来回切换。: where a user may need to switch between the anchor role and the audience role.
您可以在进房前通过 TRTCParams 中的 role 字段确定角色，也可以通: You can set the role during room entry by specifying the "role" field in TRTCParams. You can also call switchRole to switch the role after room entry.
TRTCRoleAnchor: 主播，可以上行视频和音频，一个房间里最多支持50: TRTCRoleAnchor: anchor, who can send video and audio. Up to 50 anchors are allowed to send audio and video at the same time in a room.
TRTCRoleAudience: 观众，只能观看，不能上行视频和音频，一个房间: TRTCRoleAudience: audience, who can play but cannot send audio or video. There is no upper limit on the audience size in a room.
画面质量可通过设置视频编码器相关参数: Setting encoder parameters to adjust video quality
该设置决定了远端用户看到的画面质量（同时也是云端录制出的视频文件的画面质量）: Encoder parameters determine the quality of video watched by remote users and recorded in the cloud.
通常声音采集只会采集麦克风声音，如果调用 startPlayMusic 接口播放: Normally, TRTC captures only the audio of the mic, but if you call startPlayMusic to play background music, the music will also be captured.
如果调用 startSystemAudioLoopback 接口开启了系统音量采:
If the system audio capturing API startSystemAudioLoopback is called and the user plays music or video using another application, 
      the audio of the application will also be captured.
语音通话场景，支持 48kHz，支持双声道。单个房间最多支持300人同时在线，最: Audio calls support 48 kHz stereo audio. Each room allows up to 300 concurrent users, and up to 50 of them can speak simultaneously.
适合：[1对1语音通话]、[300人语音会议]、[语音聊天]、[语音会议]、[在: Use cases: [one-to-one audio call], [audio conferencing with up to 300 participants], [audio chat], [online Werewolf], etc.
语音互动直播，支持平滑上下麦，切换过程无需等待，主播延时小于300ms；支持十万: Interactive live audio streaming allows smooth mic on/off without waiting. Anchor latency is lower than 300 ms and playback latency lower than 1,000 ms. Up to 100,000 users can play the anchor’s audio at the same time.
适合：[语音低延时直播]、[语音直播连麦]、[语聊房]、[K 歌房]、[FM 电: Use cases: [low-latency live audio streaming], [live audio co-anchoring], [audio chat room], [karaoke room], [FM radio], etc.
直播场景下的角色，默认值：主播: Role in live streaming scenarios, anchor by default
SDK 提供接口，用于网络、摄像头、麦克风、扬声器检测。: The TRTC SDK offers APIs for network, camera, mic, and speaker testing.
如果不能看到图像，说明摄像头不可用: If you cannot see an image, the camera is not available.
请对着麦克风说话，此处数值大于零，说明麦克风正常: Talk to the mic. If the value is greater than 0, the mic works properly.
能听到声音，扬声器音量数值不断变化，说明扬声器正常: If you can hear audio and the displayed volume changes continuously, the speaker works properly.
屏幕分享, 支持选择使用主路或辅路进行屏幕分享: Sharing the screen via the primary stream or substream
一个用户同时最多只能上传一条主路（TRTCVideoStreamTypeBig）:
A user can upload at most one primary stream (TRTCVideoStreamTypeBig) and one substream (TRTCVideoStreamTypeSub) at the same time. 
                By default, the screen is shared via the substream. If you use the primary stream, we recommend that you stop camera capturing (stopLocalPreview) to avoid conflicts.
视频通话场景，支持720P、1080P高清画质，单个房间最多支持300人同时在线: Video calls support 720p and 1080p HD video. Each room allows up to 300 concurrent users, and up to 50 of them can speak simultaneously.
适合：[1对1视频通话]、[300人视频会议]、[在线问诊]、[视频聊天]、[远: Use cases: [one-to-one video call], [video conferencing with up to 300 participants], [online medical consultation], [video chat], [video interview], etc.
视频互动直播，支持平滑上下麦，切换过程无需等待，主播延时小于300ms；支持十万: Interactive live video streaming allows smooth mic on/off without waiting. Anchor latency is lower than 300 ms and playback latency lower than 1,000 ms. Up to 100,000 users can play the anchor’s video at the same time.
适合：[视频低延时直播]、[十万人互动课堂]、[视频直播 PK]、[视频相亲房]: Use cases: [low-latency live video streaming], [interactive classroom for up to 100,000 participants], [live video competition], [video dating room], [remote training], [large-scale conferencing], etc.
请先同意隐私协议！: Agree to the Privacy Policy first.
请检查密码，密码长度不低于6个字符: The password must contain at least 6 characters.
注册功能异常，请稍后重试，或者改用手机号码+验证码登录: Register error. Please try again later, or login with phone number and SMS code.
我已阅读并同意: I have read and agree to the
确定注销当前用户吗？: Are you sure to unregister current user?
请先配置好您的账号信息： SDKAPPID 及 SECRETKEY，配置文件位置: Please config your account information: SDKAPPID and SECRETKEY，configuration path：assets/debug/gen-test-user-sig.js
